nodes.text: Sometime between 3973 BBY and 3965 BBY, during the early years of the conflict known as the Mandalorian Wars, the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders raided the Taskeed system, a star system in the region known as Hutt Space. The battle in the Taskeed system was preceded by a victory for the Mandalorians in the Sy Myrth system. Following the Mandalorian victory at Taskeed, the Mandalorians attacked the Dennogra system.

The battle in the Taskeed system was referenced in 2009's The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry. The battle was only marked on the galaxy-wide map of the Mandalorian Wars instead of being described in prose.
